name: Swordio Sware
description:
This is a game of mini games, created for WWU's winter game jam 2019, our main theme was "thats not what swords are for", secondary being  "unrealistic physics". Compete in mundane tasks such as : Dating,  Jousting, Cooking, Laundry, Chess, and jumping. So take up your sword and win the fight!!

Each player only gets one button on the keyboard:

player 1 -Q

player 2v-P

player 3 - Z

player 4 - M

In the date mini game you must hit the hilt of the sword against Leibniz face for a successful kiss

In the laundry mini game you must cut the laundry off the clothesline without cutting the clothes

In the joust mini game choose rock, paper,or scissors to beat your opponent.

In the carrots mini game cut the carrot as fast as you can.

In the jump mini game jump to the end  (arrows).

In the chess mini-game you must make your move after the opponent makes their move.

This game was created by:

Anais

Nick

Justin

max

Kayleigh

Forest
